verbose_text: Although DAF-16 played a less pronounced role in germ cell atrophy than CEP-1 / p53, we found that DAF-16 and MUT-7, which promotes a DAF-16-dependent small RNA mediated genomic silencing pathway that can eliminate the transgenerational fertility defect of prg-1 mutants, but not cep-1 / p53, were required for ARD exit of day 5 prg-1 mutant adults in reproductive diapause.
evidence: MUT-7, which promotes a DAF-16-dependent small RNA-mediated genomic silencing pathway that can eliminate the transgenerational fertility defect of prg-1 mutants, but not cep-1
